fields.name: memberId
fields.doc: The LinkedIn member ID of the user initiating the action.  LinkedIn member IDs are integers greater than zero.  Guests are represented either as zero or a negative number.

fields.name: service
fields.doc: The name of the service. Synonymous to the com.linkedin.events.monitoring.EventHeader#container field.

fields.name: state
fields.doc: What is the current state of the account management request?

fields.name: processStartTime
fields.doc: Timestamp when the account management process started.

fields.name: requestTime
fields.doc: Timestamp when the request entered the AMS queue.

fields.name: numAttempts
fields.doc: Number of times this request has been attempted. This number is reset everytime we re-enqueue a request.
